A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a convoluted mess. There was so much going on\, it felt like no character actually had any development.

No consistency with time and scale. It was hard to tell if events were happening at the same time or if they were weeks apart.

While The Force Awakens was just a rehash of Episode 4\, it was still a very fun and enjoyable movie. However\, this latest installment was a train wreck from start to finish.
